description: MageMob Admin : A Mobile Assistant for MagentoAs a store owner, you can keep a track of all your Magento e-store activities and have order details on your fingertips through MageMob Admin! It is an Android application that connects you with your Magento store via mobile. With the help of this Magento Store Manager Mobile Application, you can view the order, customer and product details available on your online store from anywhere at anytime. It is a user-friendly mobile app for Magento store admin which gives you a detailed view of order list, details of products listed and other information. You will also find a customized dashboard having visual and textual description of total order. Core Features •     Simple integration and user-friendly UI•     Filters orders, products and sales of specific stores•     Displays order status instantly i.e. successfully delivered, pending etc•     Displays product list and details•     Provides customer details, like order details along with shipping and billing addresses•     Provides notification to the store merchant when new order is placed with every detail•     Customizable dashboard that can generate store-wise graphical sales report of specific duration i.e. 7 days, 30 days or 90 daysValue to User:This Magento store mobile application provides the user with an easy access of their Magneto store anytime, anywhere! The merchant can view order details, product details and customer details with complete and relevant statistics. Your e-store has now shrunk into your mobile, for you to carry, anywhere at anytime!Note: For smooth function of this application also download Magneto Mobile Assistant Extension to your website. Magento Extension Link: http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/catalog/product/view/id/20061/s/mobile-assistant/
descriptionHTML:
MageMob Admin : A Mobile Assistant for Magento



As a store owner, you can keep a track of all your Magento e-store activities and have order details on your fingertips through MageMob Admin! It is an Android application that connects you with your Magento store via mobile. With the help of this Magento Store Manager Mobile Application, you can view the order, customer and product details available on your online store from anywhere at anytime.

It is a user-friendly mobile app for Magento store admin which gives you a detailed view of order list, details of products listed and other information. You will also find a customized dashboard having visual and textual description of total order.


Core Features
•     Simple integration and user-friendly UI
•     Filters orders, products and sales of specific stores
•     Displays order status instantly i.e. successfully delivered, pending etc
•     Displays product list and details
•     Provides customer details, like order details along with shipping and billing addresses
•     Provides notification to the store merchant when new order is placed with every detail
•     Customizable dashboard that can generate store-wise graphical sales report of specific duration i.e. 7 days, 30 days or 90 days


Value to User:
This Magento store mobile application provides the user with an easy access of their Magneto store anytime, anywhere! The merchant can view order details, product details and customer details with complete and relevant statistics. Your e-store has now shrunk into your mobile, for you to carry, anywhere at anytime!

Note: For smooth function of this application also download Magneto Mobile Assistant Extension to your website.


Magento Extension Link:
http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/catalog/product/view/id/20061/s/mobile-assistant/
comments: Every thing good with this app. But after installation app place order button not working.what can I do now
Unfortunately keeps on crashing when loading Cannot load the app just keeps crashing, nexus 6p android 6.
